mapper.select: SELECT NICKNAME, P.NAME FROM CLUBMEMBERLIST CM LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON P.POSITION_ID = CM.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON JC.JOIN_ID = CM.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = JC.MID LEFT JOIN MEMBERINFO MI ON M.MID = MI.MID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON C.CID = JC.CID WHERE P.POSITION_ID NOT IN ('4') AND C.CID = #{cid} AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM BAN_MEM_LIST) AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM DROP_CLUB) AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM VOTE_BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')-TO_DATE(BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) < 4)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE_BOARD(B_ID, VOTE_ID, WRITER, CLUBMEM_ID, CNT, BDATE, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES(VOTE_BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{type}, FN_ID_TO_CLUBMEMBER_ID(#{id}, #{cid}), FN_CLUBMEMBER_NICKNAME_TO_ID(#{realsuspect}, #{cid}), 0, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{content})

INSERT INTO VOTE_BOARD(B_ID, VOTE_ID, WRITER, CLUBMEM_ID, CNT, BDATE, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES(VOTE_BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{type}, FN_ID_TO_CLUBMEMBER_ID(#{id}, #{cid}), FN_ID_TO_CLUBMEMBER_ID(#{id}, #{cid}), 0, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT VT.TYPE,V.TITLE,FN_CLUBMEMBER_NICKNAME(V.CLUBMEM_ID) AS SUSPECT, V.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')-TO_DATE(V.BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS DDATE ,TO_CHAR(FN_AGREE_PERCENT(#{bid})) AS PERCENT FROM VOTE_BOARD V LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST CM ON V.WRITER = CM.CLUBMEM_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON CM.JOIN_ID = JC.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON JC.MID = M.MID LEFT JOIN MEMBERINFO MI ON MI.MID = M.MID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON C.CID = JC.CID LEFT JOIN VOTE_TYPE VT ON V.VOTE_ID = VT.VOTE_ID WHERE C.CID = #{cid} AND V.B_ID=#{bid}

SELECT FN_CLUBMEMBER_NICKNAME(V.CLUBMEM_ID) AS VOTER FROM VOTER V LEFT JOIN VOTE_BOARD VB ON V.B_ID = VB.B_ID LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST CM ON V.CLUBMEM_ID = CM.CLUBMEM_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON JC.JOIN_ID = CM.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON JC.CID = C.CID WHERE CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM BAN_MEM_LIST) AND VB.B_ID = #{bid} ORDER BY VB.B_ID

SELECT NICKNAME, P.NAME FROM CLUBMEMBERLIST CM LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON P.POSITION_ID = CM.POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON JC.JOIN_ID = CM.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = JC.MID LEFT JOIN MEMBERINFO MI ON M.MID = MI.MID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON C.CID = JC.CID WHERE P.POSITION_ID IN ('3','2') AND C.CID = #{cid} AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM BAN_MEM_LIST) AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM DROP_CLUB) AND CM.CLUBMEM_ID NOT IN (SELECT CLUBMEM_ID FROM VOTE_BOARD WHERE TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')-TO_DATE(BDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) < 4)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE_BOARD VB LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST CM ON VB.CLUBMEM_ID = CM.CLUBMEM_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON CM.JOIN_ID = JC.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON C.CID = JC.CID WHERE C.CID=#{cid}

SELECT NUM, BID, TITLE, NICKNAME, SUSPECT,BDATE, CDATE, CNT, TYPE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, T.* FROM (SELECT TO_NUMBER(V.B_ID) AS BID, V.TITLE, MI.NICKNAME, FN_CLUBMEMBER_NICKNAME(V.CLUBMEM_ID) AS SUSPECT, TO_CHAR(V.BDATE) AS BDATE,TO_CHAR(V.BDATE+3) AS CDATE, V.CNT, VT.TYPE FROM VOTE_BOARD V LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST CM ON V.WRITER = CM.CLUBMEM_ID LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB JC ON CM.JOIN_ID = JC.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON JC.MID = M.MID LEFT JOIN MEMBERINFO MI ON MI.MID = M.MID LEFT JOIN CLUB C ON C.CID = JC.CID LEFT JOIN VOTE_TYPE VT ON V.VOTE_ID = VT.VOTE_ID WHERE C.CID = #{cid} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(V.B_ID) DESC) T) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
